# iru_device_commands (Data Source)

List commands sent to a device.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_device_commands" "example" {
  device_id = "your-device-uuid"
  limit     = 10
}

output "recent_commands" {
  value = data.iru_device_commands.example.commands
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.

### Optional

- `limit` (Number) Limit results (max 300).

### Read-Only

- `commands` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--commands))

<a id="nestedatt--commands"></a>
### Nested Schema for `commands`

Read-Only:

- `command_type` (String)
- `date_completed` (String)
- `date_requested` (String)
- `status` (Number)
- `uuid` (String)
